fixes.name: Change Initial Cash USD
fixes.dax_expression: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T] - 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T -1]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level subtraction into a DAX calculated column by referencing the two calculated fields using the 'TableName'[ColumnName] format. This preserves the original per-row logic: Initial Cash USD T minus Initial Cash USD T -1.
